resources.string: Private Key could not decrypt this input

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.
Encrypt and Decrypt inputted text by rotor set values.

From Up to Down and Left to Right: Switch mode, Input space, Delete input and result button, Random values for rotors (see below), Share result button and Copy result button, Result board, Rotor 1, Rotor 2, Rotor 3, each Rotor has Plus value and Minus value buttons.

Write the message you want to encrypt in input space, and if needed set values for the 3 rotors. First rotor has 26 variations and uses Caesar cipher based on its value. Other 2 Rotors use Enigma rotor principles and have algorithms to mix input letters based on their value\'s mathematical value. See encrypted text on Result Board.

To decrypt Basic-Cipher encrypted text, change the mode of Switch from Encrypt to Decrypt, write encrypted text in Input space and set EXACT same values of the rotors as when the text was encrypted. Even 1 wrong value of rotor will cause wrong decryption result. See decrypted text on Result Board.
Encrypt and Decrypt inputted text by rotor set values and convert to 3 Barcode formats. Barcodes can be downloaded in PNG format.

From Up to Down and Left to Right: Switch mode, Input space, Delete input and result button, Share result button, Download result button, Result board, Radiobutton of QR Code, Radiobutton of Aztec Code, Radiobutton of Code 128. In Decryption mode: import from Gallery button and Scan from camera button.

After text is inputted, your text is encrypted with the values of Rotors from Home section and shown on Result Board. Depending on Your choice it converts to QR Code, Aztec Code or Code 128 Barcode formats. See encrypted barcode on Result Board.

For decryption of encrypted barcode, 2 ways are available: choose a picture with barcode from Gallery, and Scan directly from device\'s camera. Note that Decryption is being done with Rotor values of Home section. While Scanning barcode from camera You can turn on flash using volume up key of device. See decrypted text on Board.

Using AES encryption system with of conversion Encrypt and Decrypt inputted text with 1 key. AES is extremely secure way to encrypt data. Till today it hasn\'t been cracked. AES is perfect for big data transfer, because it is practicaly unlimited.
From Up to Down and Left to Right: Switch mode, Input Key space, Input Message space, Delete input and result button, Share result button and Copy result button, Result board.
Inputted Message is encrypted by AES algorithm with Key written in Key Input space. Note that without Key text you won\'t be able to decrypt the message. Encrypted text is shown on Board.
Write in the Key of encryption of text and write in the encrypted text in below space for input. Even 1 character missinput will cause wrong decryption. See decrypted text on Board.

Using Receiver\'s Public Key encrypt text message that can only be decrypted by the owner of Public Key by Private Key. RSA is perfect choice if You don\'t have secure channel for delivering key of encryption.
From Up to Down and Left to Right: Switch mode, Input Public Key of Receiver space, Input Message space, Delete input and result button, Share result button and Copy result button, Result board.

Paste the Public Key of Receiver in it\'s space and write message you want to send. On Result Board the encrypted text is shown. Note that the encrypted text can be decrypted only by the owner of Public Key by Private Key.
In Decrypt mode You can decrypt only the texts which are initially encrypted by Your Public Key, because You have Private Key of that Cipher. The original message is shown on Result Board.
